replies.body: What is the teamspeak server for Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: What is the teamspeak server for Avicus?

replies.body: The teamspeak server is used with teamspeak 3, see here for a download http://www.teamspeak.com/?page=downloads. It is a place for Avicus players to verbally communicate with each other, it's a lot of fun and I would recommend that you try it out. If you get it, connect with the ip: 'ts.avicus.net' and enjoy.
replies.body_tagged: The teamspeak server is used with teamspeak 3, see here for a download http://www.teamspeak.com/?page=downloads. It is a place for Avicus players to verbally communicate with each other, it's a lot of fun and I would recommend that you try it out. If you get it, connect with the ip: 'ts.avicus.net' and enjoy.

reply_to.body: What is the teamspeak server for Avicus?
reply_to.body_tagged: What is the teamspeak server for Avicus?

replies.body: I got it, and one last question (anyone can answer) Can TS be used for staff interviews? As in, am I allowed to type during the interview? Not use Voice?
replies.body_tagged: I got it, and one last question (anyone can answer) Can TS be used for staff interviews? As in, am I allowed to type during the interview? Not use Voice?
